name: react-native-skia-module
description: Template for building modules on top of @shopify/react-native-skia
author: Hanno J. GÃ¶decke <die.drei99@yahoo.de> (https://github.com/hannojg)

scripts.clean-rnskia: git submodule deinit -f -- externals/react-native-skia && yarn rimraf ./externals/react-native-skia && git submodule update --init
scripts.build-rnskia: cd externals/react-native-skia && git submodule update --init --recursive && yarn bootstrap && yarn build-skia && yarn copy-skia-headers
scripts.copy-skia-module-headers: yarn rimraf ./module/cpp/skia/modules/ && mkdir -p ./module/cpp/skia/modules/skottie/include && mkdir -p ./module/cpp/skia/modules/skottie/src/text && cp -a ./externals/react-native-skia/externals/skia/modules/skottie/include/. ./module/cpp/skia/modules/skottie/include && cp ./externals/react-native-skia/externals/skia/modules/skottie/src/text/SkottieShaper.h ./module/cpp/skia/modules/skottie/src/text/SkottieShaper.h
